org.apache.flink.runtime.instance

Class DummyInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.topology.NetworkNode
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.instance.Instance
        • org.apache.flink.runtime.instance.DummyInstance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOReadableWritable

    public class DummyInstance
extends Instance
    A DummyInstance is a stub implementation of the Instance interface. Dummy instances are used to plan a job execution but must be replaced with concrete instances before the job execution starts.

      HardwareDescription getHardwareDescription()
      Returns the instance's hardware description as reported by the instance itself.
